alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:22PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Thunderstorm winds and potentially additional thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 700 PM MST... At 621 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds along a line extending from Camelback Mountain to Fiesta Mall to Seville to near Magma to 8 miles east of Florence. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. Blowing dust possible. Additional storm redevelopment possible. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Casa Grande, Florence, Paradise Valley, Coolidge, Laveen, East Mesa, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Salt River Indian Community, South Phoenix, Arizona State Fairgrounds and San Tan Valley. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 141 and 193. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 201. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
